thread.title: ELLE MAHOMED

author: ELLE MAHOMED
title: ELLE MAHOMED
text: WE WAITED FOR SO 5MINUTES AND WE WERE ATTENDED BY A VERY FRIENDLY LADY "TARA"..SHE HELPED US THROUGHTHE PAPER WORK WITHOUT ANY COMPLICATION,EVEN ASK WHAT CAR WOULD WE LIKE,NOT JUST THE OPTION OF THE CAR BUT EVENTHE OPTION OF COLOUR..WOW!!KEEP IT UP!!MY WIFE & I WERE JUST IMPRESSED..TOOK ME TO VIEW THE CAR BEFORE SIGNING ANYTHING.. WHEN RETURNING THE CAR,WE WERE ALSO HELPED BY A FRIENDLY "RICARDO"..HE CHECKED THE CAR MILEAGE,CONDITION,FUEL ETC.. AND EVEN THANKED ME FOR LOOKING AFTER THE CAR SO WELL..THANK YOU TEMPEST..U GUYS ROCK!!!!ANYTIME!!!EXCELLENT TEAM,KEEP IT UP!!!
